comment.author: 36844288@N00
comment._content: Marvellous photo - I wonder if this isn't Brock near Preston in Lancashire on the old A6 trunk road? It could account for the array of pumps as this was the main road north. You can see Pratts petrol (became Esso) as well as Shell and National Benzole (the 'Mercury' figure on the globe). I also like the multi-armed GPO telegraph/telephone poles! - I once heard that the arms are bolted to the side of the poles facing London and if that was true (?) this would be looking south!

comment.author: 36844288@N00
comment._content: There's even a bit of me that wants to think that the gable end of the building on the right might just be the place today? Is anyone local to Preston able to do any more research? View Larger Map
